channel.title: One Minute Polish
channel.itunes:summary: Learn Polish with Ania as she teaches you the basics of Polish. In this podcast you'll be learning just enough Polish to get by on a holiday or business trip to Poland. Each lesson includes just over one minute of language-learning content, so there's no excuse not to learn! Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more.
channel.itunes:author: Radio Lingua Network
channel.description: Learn Polish with Ania as she teaches you the basics of Polish. In this podcast you'll be learning just enough Polish to get by on a holiday or business trip to Poland. Each lesson includes just over one minute of language-learning content, so there's no excuse not to learn! Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Learn Polish in minutes with the Radio Lingua Network

item.title: Radio Lingua Network News: 26 September 2008
item.description: Happy European Day of Languages to all our listeners! By way of joining in this international celebration of languages and language-learning we're delighted to introduce eight new podcasts today. We're adding Catalan, Danish, French, Japanese, Mandarin and Romanian to our One Minute Languages series; we're introducing our first podcast for English learners - Write Back Soon will help learners master Phrasal Verbs; and we're finally announcing the long-awaited sequel to Coffee Break Spanish: it's Show Time!
item.content:encoded: Happy European Day of Languages to all our listeners! By way of joining in this international celebration of languages and language-learning we're delighted to introduce eight new podcasts today. We're adding Catalan, Danish, French, Japanese, Mandarin and Romanian to our One Minute Languages series; we're introducing our first podcast for English learners - Write Back Soon will help learners master Phrasal Verbs; and we're finally announcing the long-awaited sequel to Coffee Break Spanish: it's Show Time!
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy European Day of Languages to all our listeners

item.title: Radio Lingua Network News: 5 September 2008
item.description: The latest news from Radio Lingua including details of Coffee Break Spanish arrangements, new podcasts launched this autumn and the Radio Lingua video contest in which you can win an iPod.

item.title: Lesson 10 - One Minute Polish
item.description: In lesson 10, the final lesson of One Minute Polish, you will learn a few useful phrases in Polish including 'cheers', 'happy birthday' and 'I love you'. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Polish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com
item.content:encoded: In lesson 10, the final lesson of One Minute Polish, you will learn a few useful phrases in Polish including 'cheers', 'happy birthday' and 'I love you'. item.itunes:subtitle: Learn some useful phrases in Polish

item.title: Lesson 09 - One Minute Polish
item.description: In lesson 9 of One Minute Polish you will learn to ask people how they're feeling and to answer the question yourself. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Polish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com

item.title: Lesson 08 - One Minute Polish
item.description: In lesson 8 of One Minute Polish you will learn to count from one to ten. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Polish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com

item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to count from one to ten

item.title: Lesson 07 - One Minute Polish
item.description: In lesson 7 of One Minute Polish you will learn to say that it's nice to meet someone. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Polish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com

item.title: Can't wait to download weekly shows? Find out more by listening...
item.description: Find out how you can get the whole course now and benefit from the enhanced version of each podcast with synchronised flashcards and a lesson guide featuring all vocabulary and pronunciation tips. The premium version of this course is available now in our store at http://www.radiolingua.com/store/
item.content:encoded: Find out how you can get the whole course now and benefit from the enhanced version of each podcast with synchronised flashcards and a lesson guide featuring all vocabulary and pronunciation tips. The premium version of this course is available now in our store at http://www.radiolingua.com/store/
item.itunes:subtitle: Get the complete One Minute Polish series now

item.title: Lesson 06 - One Minute Polish
item.description: In lesson 6 of One Minute Polish you will learn how to introduce yourself and ask other people for their names. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Polish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com

item.itunes:subtitle: Learn how to introduce yourself

item.title: Lesson 05 - One Minute Polish
item.description: In lesson 5 of One Minute Polish you will learn how to say that you're learning Polish - and that it's quite difficult! Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Polish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com

item.title: Lesson 04 - One Minute Polish
item.description: In lesson 4 of One Minute Polish you will learn how to say 'I don't understand' in Polish. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Polish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com

item.title: Lesson 03 - One Minute Polish

item.title: Lesson 02 - One Minute Polish
item.description: In lesson 2 of One Minute Polish you will learn four useful words and phrases - 'yes', 'no','please' and 'thank you'. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Polish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com

item.title: Lesson 01 - One Minute Polish
item.description: In lesson 1 of One Minute Polish you will learn how to say 'hello' and 'goodbye' in Polish. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Polish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com
